short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a question and click the icon to generate similar questions with solutions to help you practice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight your question, click the icon to generate a similar question, and finally generate the answer to that new generated question with another click of a button.
